data.prayer: Father, for those with enemies and who are afraid in North Carolina, call them into your shelter and safety today.
data.verse: For you have been a refuge for me, a strong tower from the enemy.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of North Carolina, United States

data.prayer: Spirit, train the church of North Carolina, United States to trust with all their hearts, and you will make their paths straight.
data.verse: Trust in Yahweh with all your heart, and don’t lean on your own understanding. In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight.

data.section_summary: On average, 7 people will die without Jesus in the next hour in North Carolina, United States.
data.prayer: Father, send your gospel to these.
Father, give the disciples of the the state of North Carolina an urgency of seeing every people and place reached for the gospel.
data.verse: As long as it is day, we must do the works of him who sent me. Night is coming, when no one can work.

data.prayer: Father, let love abound more and more in the church of North Carolina, United States.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Mandeaen people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Mandeaen people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Mandeaen people is yours.
Father, bring yourself glory in North Carolina. Through your servants plant 2,100 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Father, please send teachers of your Word in North Carolina who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.

data.section_summary:
the state of North Carolina, United States has a population of 10,501,400.

We estimate North Carolina has 2,773,021 people who might know Jesus, 5,259,595 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 2,468,785 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 3 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 2,773,021 believers find a person of peace today among the 7,728,380 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”
